i assume
i don't actually consider myself well versed in things

and then we'll get the people who assume that the moment we drop the budget the entire world will attempt to nuke them, so we need to keep the military around forever or die[/bq]
Yeah; everything is going to eventually work out but the problem is how many people think that if you reduce the budget the entire world will have a nuclear war.  We're talking a huge societal shitstorm.
